title: BoA
summary: Kwon Bo-ah (Korean: 권보아,[2] born November 5, 1986), known professionally as BoA,[3] is a South Korean singer, songwriter, dancer, record producer and actress. BoA has been recognized as one of the most successful and influential Korean entertainers throughout her career, and is therefore commonly credited as the "Queen of K-pop."[4][5][6]
